#### <s class="topic-title">[[Minority stress]]</s>

experiencing [[prejudice]]/discrimination leads to high [[stress]] levels, causing negative mental and physical health outcomes
^[[[course - Psychology of Race and Gender]]]

**See**:: [[mental health]], [[racism]]
